name: @nathanpb/progress
description: Library for creating highly customizable CLI-like progress bars in javascript
author: Nathan P. Bombana <nathan.pbombana@gmail.com>(https://github.com/NathanPB)

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist coverage docs/api docs/README.md benchmarks
scripts.docs: typedoc --entryPoints src/index.ts --out docs/api && cp README.md docs
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE dist
